body.name: Method Men 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner, Sea and Surf, Paraben and Phthalate Free, 14 fl oz, 1 Ct
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 15 mins
features: Contains (1) 14 ounce bottle of men's 2in1 shampoo + conditioner.
Combined shampoo + conditioner with plant-based cleansers and conditioners.
Bottle (minus cap) made with 65% recycled plastic
Cruelty free. Not tested on animals.
body.description: want clean, conditioned hair without the fuss? this daily shamp-ditioner (see what we did there?) gets the job done in a jiffy. made with refreshing menthol and an infusion of argan + jojoba oil, it cleans + conditions your hair and scalp in one simple, sensationally scented step.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: Was on the hunt for a new shampoo after a price increase on the one I was currently using. I am often not big on overly smelly products, and this one did not disappoint. It is a really pleasant smell that makes me feel nice, clean, and adds a bit of confidence as well. Sticks with you throughout the day, but is not overpowering. Cleans and lathers very nicely and I plan to add the same body wash scent next. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Great!, Awesome price.
reviews.reviewText: The ''Method Men'' shampoo/conditioner smells like a sweet manly cologne, The price is very low at $11,Which makes it a more obvious choice to purchase then buying other separate more expensive bottles of shampoo and conditioner brands for twenty plus dollars or more, With this combo bottle, You get two hair products for the price of one!, And you get the added value of argan and Jojoba oil inside the shampoo combo, Which makes your hair silky-smooth while smelly sweet and masculine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells good - need more conditioner
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our son who has thick and longer hair with a bit of curl. He has used it for about a week and half and has told me that it needs more conditioner. So he’s using this product but also an additional conditioner product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am normally hesitant when it comes to 2-in-1 shampoos & conditioners but had heard great things about this product (and most other products offered by Method). I caved and decided to try it and haven't looked back since! This has a deep, rich lather that smells absolutely amazing and lasts all day. Within 2-3 weeks, I could tell a huge difference in how much softer/silkier my hair was as well as how it kept the glossy sheen for 24+ hours! Although a bit more expensive than competing brands offering mens 2-in1, I definitely feel as though this is the best on the market at the moment and worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE METHOD MEN PRODUCTS
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely awesome body wash. I love all Method Men products. They cost more than others, but worth the price. This body wash is great!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used it it was nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a difference a good shampoo makes.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the usual Dove, Suave, and other generic brands you'd see in the grocery store for hair care my entire life and was never particularly impressed. I was recently recommended Method's products and not only does it smell MUCH better, my hair has more texture and life to it.Do yourself a favor and switch from your generic store-bought shampoo to a Method product. I use this alongside a Method body wash and I'm always complimented on my smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, scent is strong
reviews.reviewText: Really good shampoo and conditioner, would have given 5 stars but the scent is too strong for my liking.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy Útil y de buena calidad
reviews.reviewText: esta marca de shampoo me la recomendó mi nieta, debido a que me salía caspa muy frecuente, y me dijo que cambiara de marca y me recomendó ésta y si me dió muy buen resultado

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen Olor. Pésimo para cuero cabelludo
reviews.reviewText: Tiene excelente aroma y deja el cabello suave, pero después de un par de horas sientes el cuero cabelludo super super grasoso.No lo recomendiendo si padecen de cuero cabelludo grasoso o si tienen una producción considerable de cebo como yo
